@website.sugarcss-coffeekraken-io.sugar..name: List
@website.sugarcss-coffeekraken-io.sugar..description: These classes allows you to apply list lnfs to any ul, ol, dl, etc...

example.title: dl
example.code:
• Central Assurance Consultant Donnie Champlin MD
  • Corporate Assurance Associate Amy Hettinger
  • Global Paradigm Officer Mr. Norman O'Connell

example.title: ul
example.code:
• Global Program Assistant Edward Schmitt
  • Principal Metrics Consultant Ernesto Gibson
  • Central Accountability Assistant Nelson Lebsack

example.title: ol
example.code:
• Legacy Marketing Consultant Jodi Kunde
  • Senior Tactics Orchestrator Molly Block
  • Direct Optimization Supervisor Erica Harvey

example.title: icon
example.code:
• Direct Metrics Designer Catherine McLaughlin
  • Future Data Agent Tony Spencer
  • Lead Factors Facilitator Bridget Crist

example.title: RTL Support
example.code:
• Corporate Web Consultant Cynthia Pagac
  • Dynamic Usability Manager Doris Deckow
  • Internal Accounts Analyst Everett Walsh
  • Global Directives Technician Frank Kub
  • International Paradigm Liaison Eric Thiel
  • Customer Solutions Specialist Audrey Kirlin

example.title: Colors (none-exhaustive)
example.code:
• Principal Data Producer Delbert Lebsack
  • Principal Interactions Manager Walter Schaden
  • Forward Group Strategist Byron Wisozk
